column5: Found this on Youtube while trying to find an article about a camera crew going through the ice that I saw on Breakfast Television this morning.  Nobody was hurt in that incident and couldn't find it anyhow, but this was pretty funny so thought I'd share.    Joey
Nice way to wreck your new truck......
Ford owner's seem to be a recurring theme of these video and pics......glad I get stuck in my 2WD F-150 on the WAY to the lake instead of ON the lake.

And that was while all this guy holds the camera and not even trying to help out! Too bad he made it out without major damage to his truck, that may have help to teach him a lesson.  What goes through their minds?  HF
Apparently those guys on the snow machines broke thru moments before and tried to warn the guy!
All you had to do was ask, joey.  Here you go.
Thanks douG.  Hey,you guys quit picking on us for guys.LOL  No ice for this guys truck.NO WAY.
Thanks DouG, I looked for that all day   .  Made me chuckle.  Joey
Another example that Fords are for people that can`t spell Chevrolet?
Tough talk for a guy so many miles away.
Sorry!! I posted another thread on it b4 reading this one...you are right though...very funny...hehe.
LOL Brian, you want me to fall on you? Buddies from a Ford car family, he rags on my GM products, me on his Found On the Road DeadS.
Remember kids, if your in the market for a truck. Stay away from white fords. Likely rip the front end apart.
